briefTitle: The Paediatric EVICEL® Soft Tissue and Parenchymal Organ Bleeding Study
officialTitle: A Prospective, Randomized, Controlled Study Evaluating EVICEL® Fibrin Sealant as an Adjunct to Haemostasis During Abdominal, Retroperitoneal, Pelvic or Thoracic (Non-Cardiac) Surgery in Paediatric Patients
summary: To evaluate the safety and effectiveness of EVICEL® Fibrin Sealant (Human) as an adjunct to achieve haemostasis during surgery in paediatric patients.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From randomisation (identification of appropriate target bleeding site) to final fascial closure (median study procedure time 164.0 minutes [range 47.0 - 506.0 minutes])
